[docs]
class Product:
    def __init__ (self, name, price, color, size):
        self.name = name
        self.price = price
        self.color = color
        self.size = size

    def __str__ (self):
        return f"Product {self.name} {self.color} {self.size} {self.price}"

    def __repr__ (self):
        return f"Product {self.name} {self.color} {self.size} {self.price}"






[docs]
class Store:
    def __init__ (self):
        self.products = []



[docs]
    def add (self, product):
        """
        Add a product to the store
        Args:
            product:
        """
        self.products.append (product)





[docs]
    def remove (self, product):
        """
        remove a product from the store
        Args:
            product:
        """
        self.products.remove (product)





[docs]
    def all (self) -> list:
        """
        get all products in the store
        Returns: 
            list

        """
        return self.products

class Specification:


[docs]
    def is_satisfied (self, product) -> bool:
        """
        Abstract methode
        Args:
            product:

        Returns:
            bool:
        """
        pass



    def __and__ (self, other) -> bool:
        """
        implement and
        Args:
            other:

        Returns:
            bool
        """
        return AndSpecification (self, other)






[docs]
class Filter:


[docs]
    def filter (self, items, spec):
        """
        Abstract methode to filter items
        Args:
            items:
            spec:
        """
        pass








[docs]
class ColorSpecification (Specification):
    def __init__ (self, color):
        self.color = color



[docs]
    def is_satisfied (self, product):
        """
        check if a product is satisfied by color
        Args:
            product:

        Returns:
            bool
        """
        return product.color == self.color








[docs]
class SizeSpecification (Specification):
    def __init__ (self, size):
        self.size = size



[docs]
    def is_satisfied (self, product) -> bool:
        """
        check if a product is satisfied by size
        Args:
            product:

        Returns:
            bool
        """
        return product.size == self.size








[docs]
class AndSpecification (Specification):
    def __init__ (self, spec1, spec2):
        self.spec1 = spec1
        self.spec2 = spec2



[docs]
    def is_satisfied (self, product) -> bool:
        """
        check if a product is satisfied by spec1 and spec2
        Args:
            product:

        Returns:
            bool
        """
        return self.spec1.is_satisfied (product) and self.spec2.is_satisfied (product)








[docs]
class BetterFilter (Filter):



[docs]
    def filter (self, items, spec):
        """
        Filter items
        Args:
            items:
            spec:
        """
        for item in items:
            if spec.is_satisfied (item):
                yield item
